attributes.action: request that BBC 6Music is excluded from the BBC's forthcoming review of its operations on the grounds that it is a vital showcase for new British creative talent and through its eclectic mix of music, which is unavailable in the commercial radio sector, means that the station is true to the BBC's original purpose: to educate, inform and entertain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
